level.text: 807.1 In determining whether the applicant has more than fifty percent (50%)f the assets of the business enterprise located in the District, the Departmenthall consider the location of fixed assets, including property, plant, andquipment, and exclude bank accounts, accounts receivable, and intangiblessets, such as goodwill, patents, copyrights, or trademarks.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 9052 (December 4, 1992); as amendedy Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 8439 (October 23, 2009), incorporatingy reference text of Proposed Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 5622, 5628 (July0, 2009).
